fr.xephi.authme.data.captcha

Class LoginCaptchaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.data.captcha.LoginCaptchaManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CaptchaManager, HasCleanup, SettingsDependent

    public class LoginCaptchaManager
extends Object
implements CaptchaManager, SettingsDependent, HasCleanup
    Manager for the handling of captchas after too many failed login attempts.

      • checkCode

        public boolean checkCode(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                         String code)
        Description copied from interface: CaptchaManager
        Checks the given code against the existing one. This method is not reentrant, i.e. it performs additional state changes on success or failure, such as modifying some counter or setting a player as verified.

        On success, the code associated with the player is cleared; on failure, a new code is generated.

        Specified by:
        checkCode in interface CaptchaManager
        Parameters:
        player - the player to check
        code - the supplied code
        Returns:
        true if the code matches, false otherwise
